questions.quote: Not the point. The wedding is in one week. I got this  today.
Oh, I see how it works now.  He knocks me outta commission, so  you can strut around in your fancy number one shirt.  Well, I'll show you who's number one.
It's very familiar. I can't put my finger on it. It's very familiar.
Uh, yes, uh, I--I wanted to, uh, stop by and make sure that my shark tank fits-- uh, hello.
Would you grow up, George?! What is the difference? Nina slept with him , he slept with me, I slept with Pinter. Nobody cares! It's all ancient history.
Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, have you reached a verdict?
Hey, Kramer, what was it you were having faxed to my house every 30 seconds?
Yeah. I gotta be honest with you Kramer. You might be more than just a coupla tweaks away from a healthy relationship.
Alright. Listen, I gotta get some reading done. You mind if I do this here? I can't concentrate in my apartment.
An apartment-warming gift? We got to give presents to people for moving? Birthdays, Christmas, it's enough gifts. I would like one month off.
